Text: I tried many of bobiras titles and they all worked, but never used Lucky Patcher. My phone is not rooted, is this a MUST? I have similar apps, but this one I'd like to try, sounds promising.

@Bloksee

The root is a must for all android phones.Without root is like you have the crappy close IOS.The root only takes 1 minute and then you can install anything.From titanium backup till lucky patcher to patch any of the apps that need custom patch or make every game that i upload to run(some needs root)
